burgers.name: Mega
burgers.description: Tamanho artesanal família recheado com três carnes suculentas, queijo e bacon.

burgers.name: Big Burger Bacon
burgers.description: Criado para os amantes e bacon, possui em todas as camadas bacon bem assado.

desserts.name: Cookie Dough
desserts.description: It makes for a fun appetizer or dessert for any party, bridal or baby shower, or a yummy snack to share!  Give it a try!  It is AMAZING!

desserts.name: Snickers Dip
desserts.description: This Snickers Dip is the perfect sweet appetizer to feed a crowd! And well, it’s an easy sweet dip made of Snickers. How can that not be amazing?

desserts.name: Lemon Cream Cheese
desserts.description: The easiest cream cheese fruit dip, this Lemon Cream Cheese Fruit Dip has marshmallow creme and cream cheese, plus lemon yogurt to give it the best lemon flavor.

drinks.name: Vanilla Vodka
drinks.description: Delicious drink with Whiskey, Apple Juice, and Pinch of Ground Cinnamon

drinks.name: Amazing Apple Juice
drinks.description: Apple juice with ginger beer, seltzer, and bourbon

drinks.name: Special Orang Juice
drinks.description: Orange juice with maple syrup and angostura bitters.

pizzas.name: Pepperoni
pizzas.description: Brazilian style food with pepperoni, cheese, and onions

pizzas.name: Margherita
pizzas.description: Delicious italian Margherita pizza with tomatoes and cheese
